data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋɛ. Davide ná-guyei.
Mazɔlɔɔ nu ɲɔiti ti laalaoga dàalɔɠɔma, ti ɗa tɔ̀ɠɔi ɠoloɠolo,
Ti màaɠoolia ga wɔinzeɠema ɓɔɛiti.
Ta nà-nɛɛbɛi zuloozu ga ti ɗa màalɔ,
ti ɗa nà-faa ʋagɔi zuloo ga faa ɲɔi,
Wɛlɛ, nii ɠa ti bosu:
Siɛgi zu ta ɠɛ tukpɔɠaaleʋezu la, ti peelala,
Sii ma voloi zu mina mɔ ɠooza,
Ná-dointi ti ɠɛ ga podointi,
Ná-dointi ti ɠɛ ga teʋeteʋe nuiti, ti ɗa falii wo,
Kuye nuiti ti yeeʋɛɛ kɔligiti kpein ma mɛɛ,
Nu nɔpɛ ge mina nuɓɔɠɔla ɠɛ bɛ,
Mavofodai zuwuɠaaleʋe,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mina ɠi kula mɛmɛwolani ta-vaaɠaaza golaiti su,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuyɛ nɔ ɠɔ ta-ɠotoiti ba,
Tɔɔzei, zunui nii la nuɓɔɠɔla nɔpɛ kɛɛni,
Nu voovoo vai ɠa é nɛɛni bɛ, foovooi tɔ ɓalaa so!
É foovooi loo ɠɔba, eɠɛʋelei ná-seɠei la,
É ɠɛ eɠɛ seɠei, nii é felevelesu ɓɔɠɔ ma,
Tɔun, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mu ge màalɔɔ nuiti sala ɠana,
Ee, Màliɠii, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, màalobo, è-laaseigi wɔɔlɔ vai ma,
Maawɔin nu ɠa ga ze, gè ɠɛ ga bala nu,
Nà ɲɛɛlɛzu vaa, eɠɛ niinigi é zeɠezu,
Zu so faa wolai ɠa ɲìibiiti suɓalizu,
Gè ɠɛa ti ya ga ɓaaɠulama anii,
Ɓɔ bà, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà-GALAGI!
Sìli nuiti ti ɠɛ kwɛɛ ga ɗa ɠa, è naa ɠɛai ga è-yeei,
Ta zoo ti foovooi wo, kɛlɛ ɗɔun ɗa, ɗa tuyai loozu.
Niiti ti nɔ̀un maalɔɔzu, zɔngɔi zɛlɛ ti pɛ ba,
Nà Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ ga woo wola,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa ɗa maawɔin nui maalobo,
